com.percussion.utils.jdbc
Interface IPSConnectionInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
PSConnectionInfo
public interface IPSConnectionInfo

Represents the data required to obtain a connection to a JNDI datasource.

Method Summary
 String getDataSource()
          The data source, which references the name of an IPSDatasourceConfig, case-insensitively.
 

Method Detail

getDataSource

String getDataSource()
The data source, which references the name of an IPSDatasourceConfig, case-insensitively.

Returns:
the datasource, will be null if this info represents the repository connection.
